faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About LOVEXAI.STUDIO
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us on Discord or by email.

items.title: What exactly is LOVEXAI.STUDIO and how does it work?
items.description: LOVEXAI.STUDIO is a comprehensive AI-powered creative platform that enables you to generate stunning images, videos, and audio content from simple text descriptions. Our advanced AI models transform your creative ideas into professional-quality content in seconds.

items.title: What types of content can I create with LOVEXAI.STUDIO?
items.description: You can create a wide variety of content including AI-generated images in multiple ratios, dynamic videos from text prompts, voice synthesis, music generation, and more. Our platform supports everything from social media content to professional marketing materials.

items.title: How do credits work in LOVEXAI.STUDIO?
items.description: Credits are used to generate content on our platform. Each image generation costs 10 credits, video generation costs more credits depending on length and quality. Credits are valid for the duration specified in your plan and can be purchased as needed.

items.title: Can I use the generated content commercially?
items.description: Yes! All content generated with LOVEXAI.STUDIO can be used for commercial purposes, including marketing, social media, websites, and business projects. You own the rights to all content you create on our platform.

items.title: What file formats are supported for downloads?
items.description: We support multiple high-quality formats including PNG, JPG, MP4, and audio files. Pro and Enterprise users get access to HD exports and additional format options for professional use.

items.title: Is there an API available for developers?
items.description: Yes! Pro and Enterprise plans include API access, allowing you to integrate LOVEXAI.STUDIO's AI capabilities into your own applications and workflows. Our API supports all generation features with comprehensive documentation.
